Sodium2 - Project Velocity Racer Pack - Black (for Female)

 This pack includes the following:
 • Sodium2 - Project Velocity Boots - Black (for Female)
 • Sodium2 - Project Velocity Body Armour - Black (for Female)
 • Sodium 2 Project Veloticy Visor - Green (for Female)
 • Sodium2 - Project Velocity Gloves - Black (for Female)
 • Sodium2 - Project Velocity Helmet – Charcoal (for Female)
 • Sodium2 - Project Velocity Trousers - Grey (for Female)
 Ultra lightweight and super tough, the Sodium2 - Project Velocity Range offers ultimate protection combined with anti-drag technology. [#Legal]

Pack coureur Sodium2 - Project Velocity - Noir (pour Femme)

 • Bottes Sodium2 - Project Velocity - Noires (pour Femme)

 • Casque Sodium2 - Project Velocity - Charbon (pour Femme)

 Ultra-légère et extrèmement résistante, la gamme Sodium2 - Project Velocity offre une protection au top combinée à une technologie anti-friction. [#Legal]
